General.Name: Innodep Inc.
General.Description: Innodep Inc. provides open platform-based IP video surveillance solutions in South Korea. The company offers TYBIS/VURIX VMS, an integrated surveillance platform software for enterprise with server/client structure and open platform; TYBIS/VURIX IoT-Matrix, an hardware and VMS software; InnoCodec, a codec manufacturer; and 3rd party solutions, including license plate and face recognition, GIS, sound detection, and light control. It serves citywide surveillance, public building, transportation, road/highway, public utility, school, office/corporate, banking, manufacturing, entertainment, gaming, retail, and healthcare industries. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Dream Markone Data Center, Seoul, South Korea, 08375
